timeline.headline: CSTBox project timeline
timeline.text: Here are the main events of the CSTBox open-source project life

date.headline: CSTBox goes open-source
date.text: We have decided to allow everybody to take advantage of our works and contribute to them

date.headline: Public presentation web-site created
date.text: This is a lot of work, and you are just contemplating it

date.headline: Git repository fully populated
date.text: All modules have been migrated to the new organization. Enjoy ;)

date.headline: CSTBox speaks MQTT
date.text: MQTT support added to inter-operating with cloud based services in the context of the WISDOM EU project

date.headline: CSTBox on Intel's Edison
date.text: A CSTBox based application is developed for the Edison module, which will be deployed in the context of the WISDOM EU project for capturing the water usages in homes

date.headline: Z-Wave support added
date.text: First set of supported products : Fibaro smart plug, Fibaro opening sensor, Fibaro multi-function motion detector (aka Sauron's Eye), Fortrezz Mimo pulse counter

date.headline: WISDOM instrumentation is operational
date.text: A multi-protocol and multi-maker extensive instrumentation is deployed in a home in the context of the WISDOM EU project. In addition to local water usage analysis, leak detection and profile learning, it forwards data and indicators to a cloud based aggregation service, using MQTT as transport protocol.

date.headline: CSTBox speaks OBIX
date.text: OBIX support addd for inter-op√©rability with an existing BEMS in the context of the PERFORMER EU project.
